*** Bug 47376 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 47429 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This timing problem could occur whenever a debug target was launched or 
terminated while an HCR was being attempted. Fixed in JavaHotCodeReplaceManager.

Please verify, DarinS.
